新研究显示，COVID-19 加强剂可增强母乳中的病毒中和抗体COVID-19 加强疫苗产品（抗体）通过母乳从母亲传给后代的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/COVID-19-booster-enhances-virus-neutralizing-antibodies-in-breast-milk-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/COVID-19-booster-enhances-virus-neutralizing-antibodies-in-breast-milk-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=721f95be-ae25-4af1-8404-d627dd56923f Thu, 07 Mar 2024 09:00:00 -0500 COVID-19 booster enhances virus neutralizing antibodies in breast milk, new study reveals

吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法恶化，与对香烟的担忧相当或超过过去十年，英国吸烟者对电子烟危害的看法有所恶化，认为电子烟危害低于香烟的人数显着下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240306/Smokers-views-on-e-香烟-harm-worsen-matching-or-exceeding-concerns-for-香烟.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=138f8784-32f5-419a-9213-bbd8e984b92d Wed, 06 Mar 2024 22:59:00 -0500 Smokers' views on e-cigarette harm worsen, matching or exceeding concerns for cigarettes
